PISTOL.strategy: **2-1-2 Setup**: 2 players A (heaven/site), 1 player mid (connector), 2 players B (main/site). Mid player calls rotations.
**Aggressive Mid**: 3 players mid (connector/palace), 1 player A, 1 player B. Mid players push for picks.
**Stack A**: 3 players A site (heaven, default, close), 2 players mid/B. Focus on A retakes.
**Connector Hold**: 2 players A, 2 players connector/mid, 1 player B. Connector players hold aggressively.
**Anti-Rush A**: 3 players A (close angles), 1 player mid, 1 player B. A players crossfire main rushes.
**Rotational**: 1 player A, 2 players mid, 2 players B. Mobile defense, fast rotates based on contact.
**Palace Control**: 2 players A, 3 players mid/palace. Palace players push for picks, deny T control.
**B Heavy**: 1 player A, 1 player mid, 3 players B. Force A plays, fast rotates with utility.
**Heaven Focus**: 2 players A (heaven control), 2 players mid, 1 player B. Heaven player holds angle for picks.
**Info Play**: 2 players A, 1 player mid, 2 players B. Conservative angles, information focus.

ECO.strategy: **Stack A Close**: 4 players A site (close angles), 1 player B. Upgraded pistols, close-range trades.
**Aggressive Mid**: 3 players mid with upgraded pistols, 2 players save. Mid players push connector.
**B Stack Save**: 1 player A (save), 4 players B close angles. Upgraded pistols B, overwhelm area.
**Connector Push**: 2 players A, 3 players mid (connector push). Mid players armor+pistol, aggressive contact.
**Anti-Force A**: 3 players A close, 2 players mid/B save. A players upgraded pistols, crossfires.
**Full Save**: All save completely. 2 A, 1 mid, 2 B. Passive angles, survival focus.
**Palace Push**: 2 players A, 3 players mid (palace push). Mid players upgraded pistols, deny access.
**Canal Control**: 2 players A, 2 players mid (canal), 1 player B save. Canal players upgraded pistols.
**Retake Focus**: 2 players A, 1 player mid, 2 players B. All save, retake utility coordination.
**Mixed Buy**: 2 players A (1 upgraded), 2 players mid (1 upgraded), 1 player B save.

HALF_BUY.strategy: **Rifle Mid**: 2 players A (1 rifle), 2 players mid (1 rifle), 1 player B (SMG). Rifles long angles.
**A Heavy**: 3 players A (2 rifles, 1 SMG), 1 player mid (rifle), 1 player B (SMG). Strong A hold.
**Connector Control**: 2 players A (SMGs), 3 players mid (2 rifles, 1 SMG). Mid rifles hold connector.
**Anti-Execute**: 2 players A (1 rifle), 2 players mid (1 rifle), 1 player B (SMG). Rifles long, SMGs retake.
**Palace Rifle**: 2 players A (SMGs), 3 players mid (2 rifles palace), 1 player B (save). Palace rifles control.
**Balanced**: 2 players A (1 rifle, 1 SMG), 2 players mid (1 rifle, 1 SMG), 1 player B (rifle).
**B Heavy**: 2 players A (SMGs), 1 player mid (rifle), 2 players B (1 rifle, 1 SMG). Strong B defense.
**Heaven Rifle**: 2 players A (1 rifle heaven), 2 players mid (1 rifle), 1 player B (SMG). Heaven rifle picks.
**Aggressive Mid**: 2 players A (SMGs), 3 players mid (2 rifles push). Mid rifles take map control.
**Retake Setup**: 2 players A (1 rifle), 1 player mid (rifle), 2 players B (1 rifle, 1 SMG).

FULL_BUY.strategy: **Standard 2-1-2**: 2 players A (rifles), 1 player mid (AWP), 2 players B (rifles). AWP connector/palace.
**A Heavy**: 3 players A (rifles + utility), 1 player mid (rifle), 1 player B (rifle). Strong A defense.
**Mid Control**: 2 players A (rifles), 3 players mid (AWP + 2 rifles). Heavy mid presence.
**Connector Deny**: 2 players A (rifles), 2 players mid (rifles + utility), 1 player B (rifle). Smoke connector.
**Anti-Split**: 2 players A (rifles), 2 players mid (rifles), 1 player B (rifle + utility). Split defense.
**AWP Heaven**: 2 players A (1 AWP heaven, 1 rifle), 2 players mid (rifles), 1 player B (rifle). Heaven AWP.
**Palace Control**: 2 players A (rifles), 3 players mid (rifles + AWP palace). Palace control with utility.
**B Stack**: 1 player A (rifle), 2 players mid (rifles), 2 players B (rifles). Force A plays.
**Retake Heavy**: 2 players A (rifles), 1 player mid (rifle), 2 players B (rifles + utility). Retake focus.
**Aggressive Setup**: 2 players A (rifles), 2 players mid (rifles push), 1 player B (rifle). Mid map control.

PISTOL.strategy: **A Main Rush**: All 5 players buy armor, rush A main with coordinated pop-flashes. Clear heaven/default quickly.
**B Rush**: 4 players rush B main with armor and flashes, 1 player A main for late rotate.
**Mid Control**: 3 players mid (1 with smoke), 2 players A main. Mid players smoke connector, take upper mid.
**A Split**: 2 players A main, 3 players mid to connector. A players smoke heaven, coordinate timing.
**Canal Control**: 3 players canal with utility, 2 players A main. Canal players smoke connector, take control.
**B Default**: 2 players B main, 2 players mid, 1 player A main. Play for picks and information.
**Connector Rush**: 4 players mid to connector with pop-flashes, 1 player B main. Connector players coordinate.
**A Fake to B**: 3 players make noise A main with utility, 2 players position mid. Execute B after rotations.
**Palace Control**: 3 players mid focusing on palace area, 2 players A main. Palace players smoke connector.
**Anti-Stack**: 2 players A main, 2 players B main, 1 player mid. Create pressure from multiple angles.

ECO.strategy: **Five-Seven A Rush**: Everyone buys Five-Seven + armor. Rush A main together with pop-flashes.
**Stack B Main**: All 5 players stack B main area. Buy upgraded pistols + armor. Play close angles.
**Mid Lurk**: 1 player lurks mid with upgraded pistol, 4 players force buy A main.
**Deagle Mid**: 2 players buy Deagle + armor mid, 3 players support. Deagles take long angles upper mid.
**Canal Control**: 4 players buy armor + upgraded pistols canal, 1 player saves.
**Anti-Force A**: 3 players buy armor + Five-Seven A main, 2 players save. Force players smoke heaven.
**Connector Contact**: 2 players buy armor + upgraded pistols mid/connector, 3 players save.
**B Contact**: 3 players buy armor + upgraded pistols B main, 2 players save.
**Split Save**: 2 players force A main, 2 players force B main, 1 player saves mid.
**Full Save**: All players save completely. 2 A main, 2 B main, 1 mid. Exit frags only.

HALF_BUY.strategy: **A Control**: 3 players buy rifles, 2 players SMGs. 2 rifles A main, 1 rifle mid, SMGs support.
**Mid Presence**: 2 rifles mid, 2 SMGs A main, 1 rifle B main. Mid rifles smoke connector, take upper.
**B Take**: 2 rifles B main, 2 SMGs mid, 1 rifle A main. B rifles clear site, take control.
**Canal Control**: 3 players mid (2 rifles, 1 SMG), 2 SMGs A main. Mid players smoke connector.
**Pick Heavy**: Spread rifles for picks. 1 rifle A main, 1 rifle mid, 1 rifle B main, 2 SMGs floating.
**A Focus**: 4 players A main (2 rifles, 2 SMGs), 1 rifle mid. A players smoke heaven.
**Connector Split**: 2 rifles mid, 2 SMGs A main, 1 rifle B main. Execute A split through connector.
**Anti-Full Buy**: 2 rifles long angles, 3 SMGs close angles. Use utility to isolate duels.
**Palace Control**: 2 rifles mid, 2 SMGs A main, 1 rifle B main. Mid rifles take palace control.
**Utility Heavy**: 2 rifles, 3 SMGs with heavy utility. Rifles key angles, SMGs support.

FULL_BUY.strategy: **A Execute**: Smoke heaven + connector, flash over smokes. 3 players A main, 2 players connector.
**Mid Control**: 3 players mid with full utility, 2 players A main. Mid players smoke connector + palace.
**B Split**: 2 players B main, 3 players mid to B. Smoke connector + B site, flash over smokes.
**Canal Take**: 4 players mid, 1 player A main. Mid players smoke connector + canal, take control.
**Default Setup**: 2 A main, 2 mid, 1 B main. AWPer mid or A main, riflers support.
**A Fake to B**: 3 players make noise A main with utility, 2 players position mid. Execute B.
**Heaven Control**: 4 players A main with full utility, 1 player mid lurk. A players smoke heaven + default.
**Palace Execute**: 4 players mid with full utility, 1 player B main. Mid players smoke palace + connector.
**Anti-Stack A**: Heavy utility on A main, 4 players execute A site. 1 player mid watches rotations.
**Late Round B**: Play default until 30 seconds, then all 5 execute B through connector/mid.
